# zenit-checkbox



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                                     | Type                       | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------- | ----------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Whether the button should not be clickable.                                     | `boolean`                  | `undefined` |
| `tristate` | `tristate` | Whether to allow "click" actions to switch to the intermediate/mixed state.     | `boolean`                  | `undefined` |
| `value`    | `value`    | Whether the box is checked. If it has an indeterminate value, then use "mixed". | `"mixed" \| "off" \| "on"` | `undefined` |
